_header: Would my good lady love me best
_description: Robert Henryson, ‘The Garmont of Gude Ladeis’ — ten quatrains

Banna.First Lines:
Wald my gud lady lufe me bestAnd wirk eftir my
                    will…
Banna.Last Lines:
…That scho woir nevir grene nor grayThat set hir haif so
                    weill
Banna.Attributed Title:
ffinis of þe garmont of gud ladeis quod maister robert Henrysoun (f.
                    215v)
